SEARCH
Module goaAssembly
Package com.goa

Class LegislativeAssembly

java.lang.Object
com.goa.LegislativeAssembly
public class LegislativeAssembly extends Object
Represents the legislative assembly of a state. The assembly manages members, officials, sessions, committees, and bills.
Since:
15-07-2024
Version:
22-07-2024
Author:
Omkar Mhamal

    • introduceBill

      public void introduceBill(Bill bill)
      Introduces a new bill into the legislative assembly. Prints a message indicating the bill has been introduced.
      Parameters:
      bill - the bill to be introduced

    • passBill

      public void passBill(Bill bill)
      Passes a bill if it has been introduced in the legislative assembly. Prints a message indicating whether the bill has been passed or not.
      Parameters:
      bill - the bill to be passed

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the legislative assembly. The string includes details about the state, members, officials, sessions, committees, and bills.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the legislative assembly
